ETH ETF volumes come out at 23% of BTC. Debate about whether strong flows will continue. SOL DEX volume continues to rise above ETH. Harris may also speak at Bitcoin Nashville. Germany already lost $124m profit selling.

articles.description: What's the Meta? With the rise of Pumpdotfun and rug pulls becoming a daily occurrence, why do crypto degens keep investing? Do these investors enjoy being scammed? It appears that people very often invest in meme coins that are very obviously going to rug pull. Once it happens, they just laugh it off on Twitter, is being scammed fun?!

articles.description:
Meet Mikol: the Dare dev that doused himself in isopropyl alcohol and had fireworks shot at him. He instantly went up in flames and was rushed to hospital, where it became apparent he suffered third degree burns.

In this episode, Mikol reflects on the biggest night of his life, details his injuries, and the grueling recovery process he’s still in. Despite the traumatic incident, Mikol isn’t done with the project. Instead, he’s planning to build a decentralized app where community members can take on dares in exchange for DARE tokens.
articles.title: What's the Meta? Meet the Solana Dev Who Suffered Third Degree Burns to Pump a Token

articles.author: Scott Matherson
articles.description:
The direction of Dogecoin and Shiba Inu are of high interest to crypto investors, given their roles as the two largest meme coins in the market. Often, the prices of Dogecoin and Shiba Inu rallying can signal a meme coin run that could send other meme coins higher. While both of these meme coins have struggled in the second quarter of the year, the third quarter may be shaping up to be more bullish.
 
Why Dogecoin Could See An Increase In Price
 
Using data from CryptoRank, we can see that the price of Dogecoin has struggled to hold gains over the last two months, seeing a 21.9% drop in price in June, with small gains of 4.24% gains so far in July. However, with the month of August coming around, there could be a turn in price.
 
 
One development that suggests that the Dogecoin price coul…
articles.title: Winning The Meme Coin Rally: Why August Could Be Good For Dogecoin And Shiba Inu

articles.author: Jamie Redman
articles.description: Following the U.S. government’s transfer of $2 billion in bitcoin, Arkham Intelligence reported that the federal agency divided the funds into two separate Bech32 bitcoin addresses: one containing 10,000 BTC and the other holding 19,799.99 BTC. Arkham speculates that the 10,000 BTC may have been sent to an institutional custody service. Arkham Reports U.S. Bitcoin […]
articles.title: US Authorities Split $2 Billion in Bitcoin Into 2 Wallets, Igniting Custody and Sale Speculation

articles.author: Dalmas Ngetich
articles.description:
Bitcoin and most crypto assets have been printing higher highs since the failed assassination attempt on Donald Trump. Looking to take over from Joseph Biden, Trump is pro-crypto and even graced the Bitcoin Conference in Nashville, where he delivered a speech.
 
BTC Inching Higher On Donald Trump’s Endorsement
 
With rising odds that Trump will clinch the presidency in November, Bitcoin prices continue to tick higher. Looking at the chart, the coin is approaching $70,000 and is less than 10% from all-time highs. Technically, a close above the $72,000 resistance level could see the world’s most valuable coin edge higher, registering fresh all-time highs.
 
 
Various factors could propel the world’s most valuable coin in the coming months, especially if Trump takes over. While the former pre…
articles.title: Bitcoin As A United States’ Strategic Asset Is Bad News: Here’s Why

articles.author: Jamie Redman
articles.description: 21shares announced it has integrated Chainlink’s Proof of Reserve on Ethereum mainnet to bolster the transparency of the 21shares Core Ethereum exchange-traded fund (ETF), also known as CETH. The crypto exchange-traded product (ETP) issuer said this integration aims to provide real-time visibility into the ethereum (ETH) reserves backing the ETF. 21shares Enhances CETH Transparency With […]
articles.title: 21shares Announces Chainlink Integration for Real-Time Ethereum Reserve Verification

articles.author: Keshav Verma
articles.description:
Data shows the Bitcoin Open Interest has shot up to a new all-time high (ATH) following the asset’s break beyond the $69,000 mark.
 
Bitcoin Open Interest Surge Could Foreshadow Volatility
 
As pointed out by CryptoQuant community manager Maartunn in a new post on X, the aggregated Open Interest for Bitcoin has observed a strong surge recently.
 
 
The “Open Interest” here refers to an indicator that keeps track of the total amount of derivatives positions related to Bitcoin that are currently open on all centralized exchanges.
 
When the value of this metric rises, it means the investors are opening up new positions in the derivatives market right now. As more positions generally imply more leverage in the sector, this kind of trend can lead to higher volatility for the asset’s price.
 
O…
articles.title: Bitcoin Open Interest Rockets Up After $69,000 Rally: Brace For Impact?

articles.author: Jamie Redman
articles.description: According to onchain data, a Department of Justice (DOJ) labeled bitcoin wallet transferred 29,799.99 BTC, valued at just over $2 billion. This move by the U.S. government follows Germany’s sale of its bitcoin and a growing belief among U.S. politicians that seized coins should be held as reserves. DOJ-Labeled Wallet Transfers More Than 29,000 Bitcoins […]
articles.title: US Government Transfers $2 Billion in Bitcoin to Unknown Wallet

articles.author: Mark Goodwin
articles.description:
This past Saturday, former president Donald Trump addressed the Bitcoin 2024 conference in Nashville, Tennessee, expounding upon the crypto and bitcoin policies likely to be implemented as part of a likely future Trump administration. Speaking in front of a banner emblazoned with the logo of Xapo bank, an institution which hopes to serve as a global bridge between bitcoin, the U.S. dollar and stablecoins, Trump’s speech revealed a policy vision that would integrate those three in order to “extend the dominance of the U.S. dollar to new frontiers all around the world.”
Talk of a threatened dollar has been circulating for years, with the petrodollar system now having ended and increasingly influential power blocs seeking alternatives to the dollar as a reserve currency. However, Trump – per …
articles.title: Trump Embraces the “Bitcoin-Dollar”, Stablecoins to Entrench US Financial Hegemony

articles.author: Jamie Redman
articles.description: Before bitcoin (BTC) hit an intraday peak of $70,016 per unit on Bitstamp on Monday, a dormant bitcoin wallet from July 27, 2017, moved 210 BTC, valued at over $14 million. 2017 Bitcoin Wallet Activity Resurfaces, 210 BTC Moved Ahead of $70K Peak In recent days, several long-inactive bitcoin addresses from 2017 have been reactivated. […]
articles.title: 7-Year-Old Sleeping Bitcoin Wallet Activates, Transfers $14M in BTC

articles.author: Krisztian  Sandor
articles.description: The government is the owner of about $12 billion worth of seized bitcoin, according to Arkham Intelligence.
articles.title: Bitcoin Tumbles Below $67K as U.S. Government Moves $2B of 'Silk Road' Tokens

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
Solana (SOL) has consistently been a top performer in the cryptocurrency market. Known for its high-speed transactions and low fees, Solana (SOL) has attracted a diverse range of projects, from decentralized finance (DeFi) to non-fungible tokens (NFTs). This robust performance has positioned Solana (SOL) as a must-have token for July. With its continuous development and growing adoption, Solana (SOL) is on track to reach new all-time highs (ATH). 
 
Mpeppe (MPEPE): Sports Fandom 
Mpeppe (MPEPE) is making waves in the crypto world with its unique blend of humor and innovation. Drawing inspiration from popular culture and internet memes, Mpeppe (MPEPE) offers a fresh approach to digital assets. The token combines sports fandom with blockchain technology, creating an engaging and entertaining…
articles.title: Must-Have Tokens Of July Solana and Mpeppe (MPEPE) With Both Tokens Set To Reach New ATH

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
In recent weeks, Solana (SOL) has seen a significant price pump, capturing the attention of investors and analysts alike. This surge has sparked debates about whether it is a short-term hype or the beginning of a long-term trend. Solana (SOL) has been known for its rapid transaction speeds and low fees, making it a favorite among developers and users of decentralized applications (dApps).
 
The Factors Driving Solana’s (SOL) Recent Rise 
Several factors have contributed to Solana’s (SOL) recent price surge. Its robust ecosystem continues to attract new projects and developers, leading to increased adoption and usage. Additionally, partnerships with high-profile companies and integrations with popular platforms have boosted Solana’s (SOL) visibility and credibility in the crypto market.
 
A…
articles.title: Solana’s And Mpeppe’s (MPEPE) Price Pump: Short-Term Hype or Long-Term Trend?

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
The cryptocurrency market is soaring with speculation as Solana (SOL) continues its impressive bull run. Alongside this, Mpeppe (MPEPE) has garnered significant attention and support from a prominent SOL whale, hinting at exciting times ahead for both tokens. Let’s explore the potential of Solana (SOL) and the implications of its whale backing for Mpeppe (MPEPE).
 
Solana (SOL) Riding the Bull Run Wave 
Solana (SOL) has been on an upward trajectory, captivating the crypto community with its robust performance. The blockchain’s ability to handle thousands of transactions per second at low costs has positioned it as a formidable competitor in the space. This efficiency, combined with its expanding ecosystem, continues to fuel Solana’s (SOL) bullish momentum.
 
What Fuels Solana’s (SOL) Succe…
articles.title: Solana Price Prediction: Will the Bull Run Continue? As Mpeppe (MPEPE) Receive Support From SOL Whale

articles.author: Scott Matherson
articles.description:
Santiment, a prominent cryptocurrency and market intelligence platform, has identified Shiba Inu (SHIB), Cardano (ADA) and XRP among its top altcoin picks. Utilizing advanced technical indicators, the market intelligence platform has pinpointed its altcoin picks as having the potential for both significant giants and substantial losses for investors. 
 
Santiment Unveils Top Altcoin Picks
 
In an X (formerly Twitter) post on Friday, July 26, the crypto market experienced a strong rebound, potentially indicating a shift from bearish trends to more bullish ones. Taking note of Friday’s bullish uptick, Santiment meticulously outlined a list of crypto assets based on their historical performance and potential for a bullish divergence. 
 
 
 
The market intelligence platform recommended that in…
articles.title: Shiba Inu, Cardano, And XRP Appear On Santiment’s Top Altcoin Picks

articles.author: Terence Zimwara
articles.description: Ethiopia’s birr plunged 30% against the dollar after the central bank floated the currency as part of reforms aimed at correcting foreign exchange market distortions. The bank also eliminated foreign exchange surrender requirements and lifted restrictions on certain imports. In return, Ethiopia, which is seeking BRICS membership, is expected to receive a $10.7 billion loan […]
articles.title: Ethiopia’s Birr Falls 30% After Currency Float; Forex Surrender Requirements Scrapped

articles.author: Camomile Shumba
articles.description: With the new license, One Trading becomes the only perpetual futures trading venue in the EU and the first cash-settled perpetuals platform in Europe, according to a company press release.
articles.title: One Trading Secures Regulatory Approval From Dutch Regulator to Offer Crypto Derivatives Trading in Europe

articles.title: Bitcoin Pulls Back Sharply After Touching $70K

articles.author: Kevin Helms
articles.description: Indian crypto exchange Wazirx has assured users that the poll conducted to gather input for reopening the platform following the recent major cyberattack is not final and “not legally binding upon the users or Wazirx.” Co-founder Nischal Shetty explained that Wazirx “will soon launch a feedback form to collect more ideas.” He emphasized the importance […]
articles.title: Wazirx Says ‘Poll Is Not Final’ — Shares Additional Cyberattack Recovery Plan
